item.description:
I have been trying to think of a theme for the next Wii based meetup, but I am missing a few key titles in my game collection that would go together.  So tonight will just be a sampler of 4 player games, that will be guaranteed to make you laugh and possibly make you look foolish. ;-)  Some of these might be fast-paced though so be forewarned if you aren't "light on your toes". :-)

 

We will be playing video game adaptations of popular trivia games, board games and carnival games, perhaps.  So grab an item that fits the food theme and come on down.

 

----------------------------

This is a Mini-Meetup. Anyone can sign up, but I would please ask that you allow new or previously inactive members get a slot if they are on the waiting list since there is limited seating.  Thanks. See this discussion for more details.

----------------------------

 

Food theme: 

The theme for this event will be "light". Please bring a food item to share with the group that is "light".  Interpret that however you want, whether that is light in weight, light on calories or glows-in-the-dark.  I will try to have also generic, healthy snacks on hand for all diets.

 

About the location: 
This event will be hosted at a private residence, conveniently located at the intersections of Route 1 and Route 95.  If you need directions, just ask.  This is a housing complex, so please do NOT park in any numbered spaces.  There are no animals on the premises.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Mini-Meetup: A Night of Wii
